column1: Swipe your individual health card through the barcode reader

Thanks! You can continue using the application
Have you finished using the machine?

First, in case you don't have a saliva sample collection kit, you need to press the 'GET KIT' button.\n
Then, you must click on the 'SUBMIT SAMPLE' button. There you will be shown the steps to follow.
I meet the requirements.\n I want to get a kit
You can get the kit from the side tank. You will be redirected to the saliva sample delivery menu
column2: where you will be shown instructions

column1: The sample has been delivered. Press 'OK' to be disconnected from the application
The printer is not responding or there are no labels left. Your session will be closed and a technician will be notified. come back later
Remember that for the saliva sample to be valid
column2: you must not have eaten anything in the last 30 minutes.

column1:
A minimum of 30 minutes should elapse between the last time you ingested any type of food or liquid and the collection of saliva.

If that time has elapsed, click the "I meet the requirements. I want to get a kit" button.

If this time has NOT elapsed, return to the previous menu and log out. Come back later.

column2: an internal error occurred. Your session will be closed

column1: The program cannot start because there are no labels left in the printer. Please put a new roll in it. Click OK when done
Are you sure you have inserted a new roll of labels?
The program cannot start because there are no kits left for users to use. Please fill in the kits deposit. Click OK when done
Are you sure you have completely filled the available kits deposit?
The program cannot start because the sample container is full and needs to be emptied. Please empty the sample container. Click OK when done
Are you sure you have completely emptied the sample container?
